1.content:
One day during a stinking hot summers day you are relaxing indoors with the AC turned up to 11.
With the rest of the family staying indoors doing other things, you hear someone going upstairs to presumably have a cool shower. But who?
1.title: Taking the shower

11.content: What does the water do to your farther?
11.title: Robert (Father)

12.content: What does the water do to your mother?
12.title: Jemma (Mother)

choices: No (a baby just appears in her womb)
123.content: Do you become her baby?
123.title: Make her pregnant.

13.content: What does the water do to your brother?
13.title: James (Older Brother)

14.content: What does the water do to your sister?
14.title: Amanda (Younger Sister)

choices: No (a baby just appears in her womb)
143.content: Do you become her baby?
143.title: Make her pregnant.

15.content:
Your aunt and cousins have come over to play and while playing you, your aunt and your cousins get really sweaty and decide to have a shower.

Your aunt, age 34 (Melody) She's a very tall, plump woman who has brown hair and brown eyes. She is very kind but sometimes absent-minded.

Oldest cousin, age 18 (Amy) She's a skinny girl with no chest to speak of, she has short black hair and hazel eyes. She doesn't like speaking with people she doesn't know but is fine speaking with her family.

Youngest cousin, age 5 (Mary) she's a very bright girl with long blonde hair and blue eyes. She is very gentle and extremely loving to her family, especially Tony because she has a small crush on him.

Who gets into the shower first?
15.title: Someone Else

choices: Something to do with a family member.
151.content: You step into the shower first. What does it do to you?
151.title: You (Tony)

1511.content: Height or Age?
1511.title: Change your height/age

15112.content: Older or younger?
15112.title: Age.

151122.content: How young do you become?
151122.title: Younger

choices: Melody (was your aunt, now your mother)
1511223.content:
As the water from the shower flowed down your back you closed your eyes and relaxed but when you opened them again you were no longer in the shower, you were on your back inside what looks to be a crib.

You try to move your body but find that your feeble limbs only have limited strength, after managing to sit up you realize that with your current strength it would be impossible to climb out of the crib.

Once the situation you were in dawned on you, you became aware of the pain of hunger in your stomach and you involuntarily began to cry and for some reason you had the strange desire to suckle on your mother's breasts, after only a few seconds the door to the room opened and the person standing there you instantly knew was your mother.
1511223.title: 1 year old

choices: Amanda (was your sister, now your mother)
One or both of your cousins
15112233.content: Even though you knew the person wasn't your original mother you couldn't help but see them as your mother.
15112233.title: Another family member

choices: Amy (was your cousin, now your mother)
Mary (was your cousin, now your mother)
both your cousins are now your mothers.
151122332.content:
As your young eyes began to focus you see both of your cousins standing in the doorway.

One of them is or both of them are your mother
151122332.title: One or both of your cousins

152.content: What does the water do to her?
152.title: Aunt (Melody)

choices: No (a baby just appears in her womb)
1522.content: Do you become her baby?
1522.title: Make her pregnant (Melody)

153.content: What does the water do to her?
153.title: Oldest cousin (Amy)

choices: No (a baby just appears in her womb)
1532.content: Do you become her baby?
1532.title: Make her pregnant (Amy)

154.content: What does the water do to her?
154.title: Youngest Cousin (Mary)

choices: No (a baby just appears in her womb)
1542.content: Do you become her baby?
1542.title: Make her pregnant (Mary)

info.brief_description: What will happen when you have a shower that can change you in any way?
info.description:
You are Tony a 6' 20 year old male student who is staying over at your familys pace for the holidays.
One day someone takes a shower which would change someone in any possible way.
But first a introduction to your family.

Your Family:
Father Robert 47 Brown hair IT technician 6'5
Mother Jemma 42 Light blonde a chef at a 4 star restraunt 5'4"
Older Brother James 23 Red hair Just got into a pro Soccer team 5'10"
You Tony 20 Black hair Student back during holidays 6'
Younger Sister Amanda 15 Blonde Student 5'6"
